Package templeengine.examples.asteroids

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsteroidsGame
    The Asteroid is the actual main game program.
    Bullet
    The Bullet is the player shoots.
    Enemy
    The Enemy is the threat of this game.
    Main
    The Main class of the game.
    Player
    The Player is the character the user controls.
    Walls
    The Walls is the edge block in the game.
